messages.subject: Eh... Pimping my AMV. LOL.
messages.msgSnippet: *sneaks in* Wonderful members of SHQ Spy.. *coughs coughs* I made a vid on the Saitou Kenshin fight entitled Awakenings. Please check it out. *coughs coughs*
messages.messageBody:
*sneaks in*

Wonderful members of SHQ Spy.. *coughs coughs* I made a vid on the
Saitou Kenshin fight entitled Awakenings. Please check it out. *coughs
coughs* Yes it's been done a million times, but Kizu just needed to do
it again. ^^;;

Enjoy for whatever replay value it's worth. ^__^

And on another note, an anonymous donor gave fanart! Whee!!! FANART!!!
Thank you to my anonymous donor. Check it out at the same page...
Saitou's wearing sunglasses... And that's just the beginning..

http://www.hajimenokizu.com/misc.htm

*scampers away*
